rows.label: tlk47100012_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey, if it isn't the true
hero's warrior troupe!

rows.label: tlk47100012_02_msg0002
rows.name:
We get shuttled around a lot on
voyages along with our Nopon masters.

rows.label: tlk47100012_02_msg0003
rows.name:
But once we settle down and
make a den, we'll stay there
for the rest of our lives.

rows.label: tlk47100012_02_msg0004
rows.name:
So you can imagine why I'm so
impressed that you people
travel all around the world!
